Name: Black Temple Bell
Description: This demon's huge bell is so heavy it can only attack once a round.

Name: Burning Wheel
Description: This demon's speed is 15, and dash moves full speed. However, the demon must move in the same direction for each action it takes, and can only move in straight lines.

Name: Ceaseless Shrieking
Description: If no foe is in line of sight of the Pale Man on its turn, it spends its entire turn shrieking. All foes take [D]+fray and must save or become stunned.

Name: Chameleonic
Description: Has stealth+ while adjacent to a void rift.

Name: Decree
Description:
At the start of the round, the Judicator Demon makes one of the following decrees, making a different decree each round than the last one. Foes that do not follow the decree by the end of the round take 2[D]+fray damage as an effect and are stunned.
- Decree of Anger: Attack this round.
- Decree of Selfishness: Do not use abilities that target allies this round.
- Decree of Paranoia: End turn without being adjacent to any other characters.
- Decree of Rashness: End turn adjacent to a foe

Actions.Name: Devour
Actions.Description: The Demon devours and absorbs an adjacent bloodied demon, destroying it permanently and gaining vigor 2. They then gain +1 action for this turn and all their turns for the rest of combat.

Actions.Name: Devour Natal
Actions.Description: Demons may Devour an adjacent Natal as a free action, giving them +1 action for this turn only.

Name: Disgorge
Description: Whenever vigor is broken, summon a natal in range 2.

Name: Dissolving Reality
Description: At the start of round 1, 3, and 5, the Maze demon creates a special area effect of Dissolving Reality anywhere on the battlefield, a blast 2 zone. The zone is dangerous terrain.

Name: Distorted Soul
Description:
• When not bloodied, gain resistance to all melee attacks. However, all ranged attacks against it becomes divine.
• When bloodied, gain resistance to damage from any ranged attack. However, all melee attacks against it become divine.

Name: Eyes Within Eyes
Description: Immune to blinded. Simply grows more eyes.

Name: Implode
Description: If the Unstable Demon reaches its overcharge counter, it explodes, destroying the demon and dealing [D]+[fray] divine damage as an area effect to all non-demon characters on the battlefield.

Name: Engorge
Description: Increase size by 1 and deals bonus damage with all actions for the rest of combat if this demon uses Devour.

Name: Last Revenge
Description: When defeated or destroyed, explodes in a blast 1 area effect. Non-demons in the area take [D]+[fray], then summon 2 Natals in free spaces in the area.

Name: Law of the Maze
Description: At the start of each round, roll 1d20 and 1d10. All values of any d20 in a Dissolving Reality zone are set to the number on the d20. All values of any other die are set to the d10 number, even that number would otherwise be invalid.

Name: Lidless Gaze
Description: At the start of the round, keep track of where the pale man is gazing, a fact that is known to all characters. Its gaze is always fixated on a foe in range 10, and affects a blast 1 area centered on that foe. It must gaze at a different foe each round from the last, if possible. If the foe breaks line of sight, the Pale Man can immediately gaze at a new character as an effect.

Name: Maddening Babble
Description: Aura 2. At the start of the Emissary's turn, all foes in the aura take damage equal to the round number +1.

Name: Mimicry
Description: In any battle with the Mimic, place 5 decoys on the battlefield at the start of the battle.

Summons.Name: Decoy
Summons.Effects: The GM secretly picks one of the decoys that is actually the Mimic. When that decoy is targeted by an ability, before the ability is made, replace the decoy with the mimic and retarget the ability to the mimic. This reveals the mimic.

Name: Pull of the Maze
Description: At the end of the round, the Maze Demon teleports one or two characters in range 8 into a Dissolving Reality zone. It may choose itself.

Name: Pure Nothingness
Description: Has evasion while in the space of a void rift.

Name: Shed Space
Description: The first time the demon vacates a space on its turn, it creates a chaos cocoon in the space it left.

Name: Split
Description: When bloodied, the Ooze summons an ooze duplicate in an adjacent space. The duplicate is an exact copy of the Ooze at the time this split happens. Unlike other summons, it does not disappear if the Ooze is defeated and has all actions, stats, traits and abilities of the Ooze except this trait. The summon acts on the Ooze's turn.

Name: Void Prowler
Description: Void Demons can create void rifts, which are 1 space terrain effects that count as pits to anything other than demons. They treat any two void rifts as adjacent spaces when moving, teleporting when they most between them. It can only teleport this way once a turn.
